title: "Pure Imagination" curly casual display face
content:
Can anyone ID this one?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211118im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/willy%20jr%20font_4250.jpg)

 [‹ (x) People Magazine fonts - Verlag Comp, Fenway {Marc O, Fabio}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211118/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18168 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Bowman Brothers Concrete, Inc. logo - Times, ITC Avant Garde Gothic {Arun} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211118/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41631 "Go to next forum topic")
author: stealyourboognish

comments.content:
It’s a free font based on the Willy Wonka logo called Willy Wonka.

- Lex
Thank you, I love this place!

You’re welcome, although I’m not sure why you’d ever want to use this font - it’s very very poorly-drawn.

- Lex
